info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

get.summary:
Retrieve statistics for configured FortiSwitches.
Access Group: wifi

fgt_peer_intf_name.title: FortiLink Interface
fgt_peer_intf_name.description: FortiLink interface that the FortiSwitch is connected to.

status.title: Status
status.description: Connection status of the FortiSwitch with this device.

os_version.title: Firmware Version
os_version.description: Firmware version that is running on the FortiSwitch.

connecting_from.title: Connecting From
connecting_from.description: FortiSwitch port that is connected to the FortiLink interface.

join_time.title: Join Time
join_time.description: Time that the FortiSwitch joined this device.

ports.title: FortiSwitch Port Details
ports.description: Details for every port on the FortiSwitch.

items.title: FortiSwitch Specific Port Details
items.description: Details of a port on the FortiSwitch.

interface.title: Interface Name
interface.description: Alias (name) given to the FortiSwitch port.

status.title: Link Status
status.description: Link status of the FortiSwitch port.

power_status.title: Power Status
power_status.description: Power status of the PoE port (0 = Disabled, 1 = Searching, 2 = Delivering power, 3 = Test mode, 4 = Fault, 5 = Other fault, 6 = Requires power).

untrusted.title: Number of Untrusted DHCP Servers
untrusted.description: Number of untrusted DHCP servers detected.

transceiver.title: Transceiver
transceiver.description: Information about the transceiver module connected to this port.

vendor.title: Vendor Name
vendor.description: Name of the vendor for the transceiver module.

vendor_part_number.title: Module Vendor Part Number
vendor_part_number.description: Vendor part number for the transceiver module.

duplex.title: Duplex Status
duplex.description: Duplex status of the FortiSwitch port.

fortilink_port.title: FortiLink Port
fortilink_port.description: True when the FortiSwitch port is connected to a FortiLink port on this FortiGate device.

vlan.title: VLAN
vlan.description: Native VLAN of the FortiSwitch port.

mclag_icl.title: MC-LAG ICL
mclag_icl.description: True when MC-LAG ICL is enabled.

poe_capable.title: PoE Capable
poe_capable.description: True when the port is capable of power over ethernet.

tenant_vdom.title: Tenant VDOM
tenant_vdom.description: Name of the tenant VDOM this port is exported to.

supported_port_speeds.title: Supported Port Speeds
supported_port_speeds.description: List of speeds this port supports.

max_poe_budget.title: Total PoE Budget
max_poe_budget.description: Maximum power that can be delivered by the FortiSwitch over all PoE ports.

igmp_snooping_supported.title: IGMP Snooping Supported
igmp_snooping_supported.description: True when IGMP snooping is supported.

dhcp_snooping_supported.title: DHCP Snooping Supported
dhcp_snooping_supported.description: True when DHCP snooping is supported.

led_blink_supported.title: LED Blinking Supported
led_blink_supported.description: True when port LED blink is supported for this FortiSwitch.

vlan_segment_supported.title: VLAN Segment Supported
vlan_segment_supported.description: True when NAC LAN-segment is supported as core and edge device.

vlan_segment_lite_supported.title: VLAN Segment Lite Supported
vlan_segment_lite_supported.description: True when NAC LAN-segment is supported only as edge device.

is_l3.title: L3 FortiLink
is_l3.description: True when the FortiLink connection for this FortiSwitch is established over L3.

faceplate_xml.title: Faceplate XML
faceplate_xml.description: An XML string containing information on how the FortiSwitch ports are configured.

vdom.title: VDOM
vdom.description: The VDOM that the FortiSwitch is a part of.

type.title: Managed Switch Type
type.description: Type of the managed switch. A physical switch can be exported to another VDOM as a virtual switch.

owner_vdom.title: Owner VDOM
owner_vdom.description: The VDOM that owns the physical FortiSwitch.

eos.title: EOS
eos.description: True when the FortiSwitch is past the End of Support date.

eos_date.title: EOS Date
eos_date.description: The UTC timestamp for End of Support date.

forticare_registration_status.title: FortiCare Registration Status
forticare_registration_status.description: This indicates device's FortiCare registration status.

ptp_capable.title: PTP Capable
ptp_capable.description: True when the FortiSwitch supports PTP.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: mkey
parameters.description: Filter: FortiSwitch ID.

get.summary:
Retrieve port statistics for configured FortiSwitches.
Access Group: wifi

schema.title: Port Statistics
schema.description: Array of managed switch port statistics.

ports.title: Statistics Port Map
ports.description: A map of FortiSwitch ports to their statistics.

tx-ucast.title: Unicast Packets Transmitted
tx-ucast.description: The number of unicast packets transmitted.

tx-mcast.title: Multicast Packets Transmitted
tx-mcast.description: The number of multicast packets transmitted.

tx-drops.title: Dropped Transmission Packets
tx-drops.description: The number of packets dropped during transmission.

tx-oversize.title: Oversized Transmission Packets
tx-oversize.description: The number of oversized packets transmitted.

rx-ucast.title: Received Unicast Packets
rx-ucast.description: The number of received unicast packets.

rx-mcast.title: Received Multicast Packets
rx-mcast.description: The number of received multicast packets.

rx-bcast.title: Received Broadcast Packets
rx-bcast.description: The number of received broadcast packets.

rx-errors.title: Receive Errors
rx-errors.description: The number of packets with errors that were received.

rx-drops.title: Receive Drops
rx-drops.description: The number of packets that were dropped after being received.

rx-oversize.title: Received Oversize
rx-oversize.description: The number of oversized packets that were received.

get.summary:
Retrieve the transceiver Tx and Rx power for a specific port.
Access Group: wifi

schema.title: FortiSwitch Port Transceiver Tx and Rx Power
schema.description: Retrieves the transmit and receive power status and limits for a transceiver port.

limits.title: Optic Transmitting and Receiving Limits
limits.description: Warning and alarm levels for transmitting and receiving light.

alarm.title: Alarm Levels
alarm.description: Switch sends an alarm when the measured value exceeds these levels.

high.title: Upper Threshold Alarm Level
high.description: Values exceeding these levels will trigger alarm.

low.title: Lower Threshold Alarm Level
low.description: Values below these levels will trigger alarm.

warning.title: Warning Levels
warning.description: When measured value is between this range it is considered to be warning.

high.title: Upper Threshold Warning Level
high.description: Values exceeding these levels are considered warning.

low.title: Lower Threshold Warning Level
low.description: Values below these levels are considered warning.

status.title: Receive and Transmit Power Measured Values
status.description: Receive and transmit power measured values.

get.summary:
Retrieve a list of devices detected on all switches.

mac.title: MAC Address
mac.description: MAC address of the detected device.

switch_id.title: FortiSwitch
switch_id.description: Serial of the FortiSwitch that the device was detected on.

port_name.title: Port
port_name.description: Name of the FortiSwitch port that the device was detected on.

port_id.title: Port ID
port_id.description: ID of the FortiSwitch port that the device was detected on.

vlan_id.title: VLAN
vlan_id.description: ID of the FortiGate VLAN that the device was connected to.

last_seen.title: Last Seen
last_seen.description: How long ago the device was last detected, in seconds.

get.summary:
Return a list of devices that match NAC and/or dynamic port policies.
Access Group: wifi

schema.title: Matched Devices
schema.description: List devices that match NAC and dynamic port policy.

mac.title: MAC
mac.description: The MAC address of the device.

last_known_switch.title: Last Known Switch
last_known_switch.description: The last known switch the device was connected to.

last_known_port.title: Last Known Port
last_known_port.description: The last known port the device was connected to.

matched_nac_policy.title: Matched NAC Policy
matched_nac_policy.description: The NAC policy that matches the device.

matched_dynamic_port_policy.title: Matched Dynamic Port Policy
matched_dynamic_port_policy.description: Matched dynamic port policy that matches the devices.

mac_policy.title: MAC Policy
mac_policy.description: MAC policy that matches the device.

matched_policy.title: Matched Policy
matched_policy.description: Policy that matches the device for dynamic port policy.

is_dynamic.title: Dynamic Port Policy
is_dynamic.description: True if this is a device that matches a dynamic port policy.

is_nac.title: NAC Policy
is_nac.description: True if this is a device that matches a NAC policy.
